scenario.sendRequestSIP:
MESSAGE sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain] SIP/2.0 To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain]> From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[InviteBranchId] Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] MESSAGE Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, PRACK Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Preferred-Identity: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 Privacy: none User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr> Content-Type: application/vnd.poc.group-advertisement+xml Content-Length: x
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><group-advertisement xmlns="urn:oma:params:xml:ns:poc:group-advertisement" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:oma:params:xml:ns:poc:group-advertisement"> <note>Hello, this is my message</note> <group> <type>"dialed-out"</type> <display-name>null</display-name> <uri>sip:blablabla</uri> </group> </group-advertisement>
